languages.text: Огромная хищная тварь, чью шкуру пронзают шипы и иглы. Кожа вокруг наростов воспалена, словно образования появились недавно и причиняли созданию боль.

traits.locale_text: Огромная хищная тварь, чью шкуру пронзают шипы и иглы. Кожа вокруг наростов воспалена, словно образования появились недавно и причиняли созданию боль.

languages.text: A giant ravenous creature whose hide is pierced with spikes and spines. The skin around the growths is inflamed, as if the protuberances have appeared recently, causing the creature pain.
languages.original_text: Огромная хищная тварь, чью шкуру пронзают шипы и иглы. Кожа вокруг наростов воспалена, словно образования появились недавно и причиняли созданию боль.

traits.locale_text: A giant ravenous creature, whose hide is pierced with spikes and spines. The skin around the growths is inflamed, as if the protuberances have appeared recently and caused pain to the creature.
A giant ravenous creature, whose hide is pierced with spikes and spines. The skin around the growths is inflamed, as if the protuberances have appeared recently and caused pain to the creature.
A giant ravenous creature whose hide is pierced with spikes and spines. The skin around the growths is inflamed, as if the protuberances have appeared recently, causing the creature pain.
A giant ravenous creature whose hide is pierced with spikes and spines. The skin around the growths is inflamed, as if the protuberances have appeared recently, causing the creature pain.
A giant ravenous creature whose hide is pierced with spikes and spines. The skin around the growths is inflamed, as if the protuberances have appeared recently, causing the creature pain.

languages.text: 这只掠食成性的巨型生物浑身长满了尖刺与骨刺，骨刺周围的皮肤发炎了。看起来，这些骨刺是最近才长出来的，因此这只生物才会无比痛苦。
languages.original_text: A giant ravenous creature whose hide is pierced with spikes and spines. The skin around the growths is inflamed, as if the protuberances have appeared recently, causing the creature pain.

traits.locale_text: 这只掠食成性的巨型生物浑身长满了尖刺与骨刺，骨刺周围的皮肤发炎了。看起来，这些骨刺是最近才长出来的，因此这只生物才会无比痛苦。

languages.text: Una criatura enorme y voraz con la piel cubierta de púas y espinas. La piel que rodea a las protuberancias está inflamada, como si hubieran surgido recientemente y aún causaran dolor a la bestia.
languages.original_text: A giant ravenous creature whose hide is pierced with spikes and spines. The skin around the growths is inflamed, as if the protuberances have appeared recently, causing the creature pain.

traits.locale_text: Una criatura enorme y voraz con la piel cubierta de púas y espinas. La piel que rodea a las protuberancias está inflamada, como si hubieran surgido recientemente y aún causaran dolor a la bestia.

languages.text: その皮膚に角と棘を持つ、巨大な飢えた生物。茂みのような肌は真っ赤に染まり、最近現れたと思しき肌を覆う突起はこの生物に苦痛を与えている。
languages.original_text: A giant ravenous creature whose hide is pierced with spikes and spines. The skin around the growths is inflamed, as if the protuberances have appeared recently, causing the creature pain.

traits.locale_text: その皮膚に角と棘を持つ、巨大な飢えた生物。茂みのような肌は真っ赤に染まり、最近現れたと思しき肌を覆う突起はこの生物に苦痛を与えている。

languages.text: Eine riesige gefräßige Kreatur, deren Außenhaut von Stacheln und Dornen durchsetzt ist. Die Haut rund um die Auswüchse ist entzündet, als wären diese erst kürzlich entstanden und verursachten der Kreatur Schmerzen.
languages.original_text: A giant ravenous creature whose hide is pierced with spikes and spines. The skin around the growths is inflamed, as if the protuberances have appeared recently, causing the creature pain.

traits.locale_text: Eine riesige gefräßige Kreatur, deren Außenhaut von Stacheln und Dornen durchsetzt ist. Die Haut rund um die Auswüchse ist entzündet, als wären diese erst kürzlich entstanden und verursachten der Kreatur Schmerzen.

languages.text: La peau de cette énorme créature vorace est parsemée de piquants et d'épines. L'inflammation autour de ces protubérances donne l'impression qu'elles sont apparues récemment et faisaient souffrir l'animal.
languages.original_text: A giant ravenous creature whose hide is pierced with spikes and spines. The skin around the growths is inflamed, as if the protuberances have appeared recently, causing the creature pain.

traits.locale_text: La peau de cette énorme créature vorace est parsemée de piquants et d'épines. L'inflammation autour de ces protubérances donne l'impression qu'elles sont apparues récemment et faisaient souffrir l'animal.

languages.text: Postu iğnelerle ve dikenlerle kaplı, dev, yırtıcı bir yaratık. Tümörlerin etrafındaki deri alev alev, belli ki yumrular yakın zamanda ortaya çıkmış ve yaratığa acı veriyor.
languages.original_text: A giant ravenous creature whose hide is pierced with spikes and spines. The skin around the growths is inflamed, as if the protuberances have appeared recently, causing the creature pain.

traits.locale_text: Postu iğnelerle ve dikenlerle kaplı, dev, yırtıcı bir yaratık. Tümörlerin etrafındaki deri alev alev, belli ki yumrular yakın zamanda ortaya çıkmış ve yaratığa acı veriyor.
